entry.title: RUNNING POINT
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,182Chapters: 8/12Kudos: 7

Summary: Summer returns to Beacon Hills, but peace does not follow. Derek no longer plans to leave and finds himself under the tutelage of someone long thought dead and whose reappearance rewrites his idea of rules, legacy, and power. Meanwhile Stiles begins to unravel. His magic is growing unstable, his health is faltering, and time is counting down. This summer the balance of power shifts and not everyone who claims neutrality is truly without agenda.

entry.title: Breaking Free
entry.summary:
Author: Jadezdominion

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 100Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Derek and Stiles had been apart for almost a year. It was rough but necessary. During that time, the Alpha had ensured that all the arrangements were in order for their new lives to begin. All that was left to do was pick up the final piece to the puzzle from the danger zone that was Beacon Hells. Only then would they finally be free.

Author: Jadezdominion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 100Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,702Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 36

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain‚Äîsilent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,297Chapters: 14/14Kudos: 72

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that ‚Äúhonor thy father‚Äù stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 143,838Chapters: 13/16Kudos: 542

entry.title: The Hunt for the Argent Codex
entry.summary:
Author: Ticket_to_Insanity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,485Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Hunters across the globe are seeking the Argent Codex - a mythical book said to hold spells, maps, and rituals that can tip the supernatural balance. After a mysterious group attacks Scott and steals a page from Deaton's collection, Stiles is forced to team up with Derek, who recently returned to Beacon Hills tracking the same cult.The two set off on a road trip across old supernatural sites to stop the cult from reassembling the Codex. Between magical threats, near-death experiences, and cramped motel rooms, their antagonism starts giving way to something hotter... and far more dangerous.

Author: Lexa9096

entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,751Chapters: 21/38Kudos: 30

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he‚Äôs finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn‚Äôt want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn‚Äôt finished yet, and she won‚Äôt rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won‚Äôt allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.
